articles.title: An Italian student got a Covid-19 vaccine pass tattooed on his arm, and showed it works with scanners - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Andrea Colonnetta said he got the QR code of his green pass, which indicates that he's vaccinated, tattooed on his arm.
articles.content:
Andrea Colonnetta may never again have to worry about remembering his green pass, the proof-of-vaccination card required in Italy to enter most indoor venues.

articles.title: Sahpra reassures SA on safety of vaccines, says 29 deaths not linked to jabs - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The South African Health Products Regulatory Authority has so far investigated 29 deaths that occurred shortly after people received a COVID-19 vaccine shot. Following rigorous investigations SAHPRA has been unable to link any of these deaths to the vaccines.
